name: phonebook-backend
description: The backend of a phonebook task for the University of Helsinki Full stack course

scripts.build:ui: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force build && cd ../Full_stack/Part_2/phonebook/ && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item  build -Recurse ../../../part_3_phonebook_backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: Paul Wisdom
